response.overview: After Russia banned gender transitions and declared LGBTQ+ people extremists, a wave of mass repression began. The film tells the story of those forced to flee their country to survive. At its core are the desperate attempts of the protagonists to overcome fear, loss, and hostility from both the state and society. This is a story of survival, resilience, and the fight for identity in a world that has rejected them. But will they find salvation beyond their homeland?
response.title: What’s Up, Extremists!
